textPlain: Interesting/unfortunate/expected that GPT-5 isn't touted as AGI or some other outlandish claim. It's just improved reasoning etc. I know it's not the actual announcement and it's just a single page accidentally released, but it at least seems more grounded...? Have to wait and see what the actual announcement entails.
Did they photoshop the screenshot from https://github.blog/changelog/2025-05-19-github-models-built... ? Other than the model id, it’s identical.
The actual announcement (now deleted on GitHub's blog): https://archive.is/IoMEg
Remember, I didn't ask for this and you likely didn't either.
they are comparing it to llama 4 and cohere v2 in the image…
Yeah, I guess it wouldn't be that big but it will have a lot of hype around it.I doubt it can even beat opus 4.1
Well, I did ask for this. If you don't like it, you don't have to use it.
Do you make the same comment on forums about old people nappies?
